title: Feature flags: Theory meets reality
description: Ryan is joined by Fynn Glover (CEO) and Ben Papillon (CTO), cofounders of Schematic, for a conversation about managing feature flags in software development. They explore theoretical and practical applications of feature flags, the issue of tech debt, and how orgs could manage entitlements and pricing models more effectively.
author: Eira May
excerpt: Schematic offers SDKs for packaging, pricing, and entitlements.
